name: DIT
discription: Most digital footage on professional shoots is shot raw, which means it has no colour baked in and the colour is applied in post-production. We apply colour to the raw footage to give an idea of how it will look.And we might be asked to put it into a viewable file so the director can watch it on a tablet on the way home.

name: DI
discription: In the days of 4K, 6K and enhanced HDR, nothing is more stunning than a beautifully graded film viewed at full resolution. To achieve the best possible results, we combine technique with passion, vision, and intuition.Our team's tool of preference is DaVinci Resolve.

name: DEVELOPMENT
discription: We are an experienced team with backgrounds in Web Design, Web Development, User Experience design, and more. We apply our digital knowledge to your businessâ€™s goals and budget to create a scope of work that will help you grow your business.

name: EDITING
discription: The film editor works with the raw footage, selecting shots and combining them into sequences which create a finished motion picture. Film editing is described as an art or skill.
